what is objects
	An object is a collection of properties, where property is an association between a key and a 	
value.

how many versions avialable in ext js and name them
	there are total 6 version available in ext js

what is extjs
	Ext JS is a pure JavaScript application framework for building interactive cross platform web applications using techniques such as Ajax, DHTML and DOM scripting. 
	
what is mvc and mvvm
	MVC is an anchitectural pattern that separates application into three components like 		
model,view,controller


	Model: The Model component corresponds to all the data related logic that the user works with.
	View: The View component is used for all the UI  of the application. 
	Controller: Controllers act as an interface between model and view components to process all 	
	the business logic for the app

	MVVM
	Model - It simply holds the data and has nothing to do with any of the business logic.
	ViewModel - It acts as the link between the Model and View.
	View - It simply holds the formatted data and essentially delegates everything to the Model.
	


what is inheritence
	objects inherits the properties from prototype objects in javaacript

What are the component names in ext js
	Viewport,container,panel,grid
	


what is difference between js and json object
	
what is difference between load and ready events
	The main differences between them are: body.Onload() event will be called only after the DOM 	

	and associated resources like images got loaded, but jQuery's document.ready() event will be 	

	called once the DOM is loaded , it wont wait for the resources like images to get loaded
	
what is an event and event bus
	javascript events are the things that happen to html elements like onclick,onblur
	event bus is the way for objects to interact by using an central event		

	
difference between ext js and angular js
	has a larger componenet librayr compared to angular
	has rich UI
	cross browser compatability
